website_summaries.verdict: Multi-functional design that improves a baby's bedroom instantly.
pros: Converts to toddler bed, daybed, and full-size bed
Designed with material that accommodates teething children
Matching changing table with storage shelf
cons: May take a long time to assemble

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib
customer_reviews.text: In love with this honestly, it's absolutely perfect! It's very sturdy and goes amazing with his bedding. Was fairly easy to put together, the last two screws gave me a bit of trouble but I eventually got it together with a little patience and a little elbow grease.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Sipe

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Multiple spots of dented and scratched wood found on this "new" crib. (The app would only allow one picture or I would show you all of them) Baby is due any second, so we have to use it but...be aware and shop smart...I didn't! I feel Amazon owes me a partial refund...but I'm sure that won't happen. I will revisit this review if they make this right, but I'll until then...this review stands.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Clean, simple, just what you need for the first few years of your child.
customer_reviews.text: Simple, but works. My girl preferred it had wheels, but alas. There are a good 4 (or so) positions for the mattress. You can put it at the highest setting for newborns, and lower it as the child is able to crawl or stand; which helps not having to bend down so far. I think the current safety ratings are ridiculous. Many people are complaining about safety ratings, but as long as the paint doesn't have lead in it, me and older generations grew up in things a lot worse than this; and we grew up fine! It looks very clean and simple.
customer_reviews.author: H B

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was recently certified as a foster care parent and needed a crib that would fit a boy or girl, a baby and toodler. This was a perfect fit. Not too bad to put together alone, seems sturdy, and doesn’t appear cheap. Very happy I bought.
customer_reviews.author: LKK

customer_reviews.title: It's wood is very sturdy and looks just like it does in the picture
customer_reviews.text: The baby hasn't been born yet but the crib has been put up. It's wood is very sturdy and looks just like it does in the picture. I honestly believe that this crib was a great value for the price we paid for it. I recommend for anyone looking for a good. crib at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Lawless

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, beautiful, and a great cost!
customer_reviews.text: This crib was well above my expectations! Its sturdy and gorgous! The crib was pretty simple to put together and everything needed for assmebly was there. The crib packaging was pretty banged up and the crib wasnt wrapped in anything. The railing was busted upon arrival, but the customer service with the dream on me company was excellent and they sent me a replacement piece that arrived within a week. I am so glad I went with this crib and I would reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated to assemble it for "Handy" person
customer_reviews.text: Long story, short: Negative Things: 1. Shipping took 7 days with Prime (says in stock on Amazon, but i called Amazon they said out of stock item) 2. Not precisely and hard to assemble 3. Cheap materials, rusty allen wrench, carton boards wobble/bent 4. Smell bad with fresh paint & dust. Positive Things: 1. Nice designed. 2. Price affordable compare to other expensive Crib but looks so simple. 3. Extra storage for clothes, e.g. without drawers needed. Overall: 1. Durability: I don't know yet 2. Easy to assemble: Definitely NOT 3. Value for money: YES
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this crib, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took probably 30 minutes, it was simple and the instructions were helpful. It arrived on time and there was no damage. I like the ability to raise the bed, it’s a good height to able to lay down a newborn and it has two more lower settings for when the little one gets bigger. There’s some space for storage under the crib and the changing table storage is great. Only thing is that most changing pads don’t fit, the one it comes with is very thin, I altered a store bought pad for more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Russell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that you cannot purchase a new changing pad for ...
customer_reviews.text: Crib is exactly what to be expected for a lower priced crib. Disappointed that you cannot purchase a new changing pad for the changing table as the dimensions are not standard. Other than that it looks and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Little Mommy 08

customer_reviews.title: Better hope you get a good one!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the versatility in the crib, I figured my son will be able to grow with it right. Wrong, I recieved my crib in a pretty damaged box, hoped for the best and opened it anyway. The middle section conjoining the crib and the changing table was cracked/ unusable. I knew it could have been damage from shipping so no big deal I'll call for a replacement piece. I emailed them only to get zero help then told me I'd have to send it back because they can't give me a replacement piece or even a replacement crib.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the buy because it was very affordable, but I now love it! Both sides of guard rails have protection for teething I love that it was super easy to assemble me amd hubby did it in 30 minutes. The color is clean and its very sturdy this is for my third child so I would highly recommend if you want a crib/changer combo
customer_reviews.author: Bethany L.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged but useable
customer_reviews.text: The box was delivered completely un-damaged however when we opened it up to start assembling every corner was broken in some way, as you can see in the picture, but the pieces were not in the box. If not for this one thing I would say this was a 5 star product. But seeing as the box was not damaged this leads me to believe they packed it broken in the first place. Thankfully it is still usable as a crib we just can’t use the shelves of the changing table which is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Penisten

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, although I wish you could use the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sturdy, although I wish you could use the changing table spearate from the crib, it detaches but you can't use it separate it has to be connected to be functional. Also the side does not slide up and down.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: So different
customer_reviews.text: I think this crib is so chic. I purchased some collapsible bins to put under the changing table and since I'm the mom who changes her baby on the bed, I ended up just using top of the changing table for the bottle warmer and wipe warmer.
customer_reviews.author: DreamsAreRealE2

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a good crib. I like how you can level the bed/mattress to the height you feel comfortable for your child. It's not solid wood, but it's sturdy and my son sleeps in it comfortably. It's unfortunate that the crib doesn't come with a mattress so buying that separately isn't the easiest considering that crib mattress aren't cheep if your looking for one. I didn't use the build in shelf because I don't need it right now since I already have a shelf previously. But overall I like the crib, especially that it can be used for toddlers as well by rearranging the bed/crib in the future.
customer_reviews.author: stephany

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions are not correct. You have to add for the changing table. They should have both dimensions in there. I just assembled it and it's way too big. No way this will fit the space I need. So what to do??? And the changing table isn't safe. If your baby's foot gets caught and you lift him out. You'd break his ankle.
customer_reviews.author: MadeWithRice

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: bed was all banged up and poorly packaged, and the changing table pieces don’t even match up to make it possible to use support bars for shelves. basically have to throw this part of the crib away because i will not be putting my baby on a flimsy piece of particle board. trust me when i say pay the extra money for a better one. also, it smells like very strong chemicals. i’ve had my windows open for days to clear it out but hasn’t helped at all.
customer_reviews.author: Madelyn Harrigan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent crib
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, great looking crib and table. Unfortunately the finish is very thin so you have to be careful with assembly or you’ll scratch the sides, ends, etc all up. Also it doesn’t come with the parts to turn into a toddler bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Decent crib with a convenient changing table
customer_reviews.text: Liked the attached changing table and the price wasn’t outrageous so we pulled the trigger. First thing you notice about it when you open the box is it does have a funky new crib smell but that wears off in a week or so. The assembly was straightforward and simple enough. A lot of other reviews said it was hard to assemble and the instructions were unclear but my lady and I had it all put together in about an hour. Only complaint is that the shelving slats I received had some small damage spots but you can’t see it when it’s all assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K.

customer_reviews.title: A monkey could do it !
customer_reviews.text: i put this thing together on my own, while pregnant ... so easy, a monkey could do it ! i did have a few pieces left over, but i double checked and nothing seemed to be missing AND, i have put my baby in it and tested it beforehand ... very sturdy ! i love it . i love the fact, that i can have this for years bc it can be turned into a crib & i love the compartments and changing table, very convenient @ a good price .
customer_reviews.author: Anna Harris

customer_reviews.title: I liked the idea of the changer being attached to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this crib/changer combo more as a functional space saver rather than just for its looks. I liked the idea of the changer being attached to the crib, as well as the 3 shelves for extra storage. And, of course the price could not be beat! I like this crib..👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: RenuJag

customer_reviews.title: Love that it was the whole kit!!
customer_reviews.text: I put it together by myself. Very easy to assemble. I just wish the wood was a bit thicker. But it is sturdy enough. And as the baby grows have to buy the rails and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy not safe!!! Cheap crib
customer_reviews.text: This was a big mistake. I wanted the changing table and the prize was right but when I got the crib it was crack the changing table is a mess. Is cheap and the parts are do not fit together. I will not put my baby in that. I’m returning it ASAP and I recommend you buy a know brand and pay a little extra for your baby’s safety!!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 4

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Product and value
customer_reviews.text: This crib was just what we were hoping for!! At first I was a little hesitant and was expecting it to be a little flimsy when we ordered it. But to my surprise and excitement it was far from that. This crib was easy to assemble, the directions were very clear, and once it was together it was VERY sturdy!! My wife and I have no problem or concerns with putting our newborn in this crib. Also, the attached changing table and shelves come in very handy for those late night diaper changes. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: This crib is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sturdy crib, it's color is gorgeous. The ONLY reason I have it 4 stars is its came damaged, not anything serious just annoying dings, dents, scratches, and splits in the wood in random spots from the shipping. I feel like anything that's being shipped should be packed with thick protective foam, especially paying this much for a crib. Once I got my crib together I couldn't obviously see any of the damage. The shelves are very spacious. Another small annoying thing is the changing pad has a GIANT orange warning label on it on both sides so it's an eye sore, I just covered the pad with a recieving blanket that matches my son's room theme.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Crib was fine except there was a design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived very smashed. Crib was fine except there was a design flaw. (Shown in picture) Husband fixed it and it’s s great crib/changing station.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Billeci

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib
customer_reviews.text: My favorite crib! I have bought it twice for both my kids, it's easy to put together and is durable and is actually black instead of a dark brown like most cribs that say they are black
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice crib for the price, it was a little difficult to put together though, I didn’t feel as if the directions were that clear. My SO and I had to re-read each instruction multiple times to clearly understand the step, it does feel sturdy though, only thing is the platform the changing table is on seems a little unstable and rocky
customer_reviews.author: Shazmeen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Everything looked great right out of the package no scrapes or dings. My husband put it together and he was able to do it without any help so I would say it is easy to assemble. It does seem a little wobbly. My son is only 3 months so he isn't very heavy yet and it holds up well. We'll have to see how it gets when he's older. The padding on the changing table is a little flimsy and I wasn't sure where I was supposed to attach the straps to so I just don't use them. But the extra space under the changing table is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Bet

customer_reviews.title: Decent crib for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I have to complain about this crib is that it didn’t come with any instructions when I got it. Mine didn’t at least. Other than that it looks good. I’ve read where people have complained about the paint smell and its not that bad at all. It just smells like a new piece of furniture that’s all. My daughters loft bed was the same way and the smell wore off fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk... buy elsewhere....dont waste your money!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First off the box came damaged. When I searched online for a crib I searched cribs with mattress included. This came up. It said four peices and picture showed bed with mattress. I would have just went to walmart and bought it had I have known. After getting it out of box it is a peice of junk. Dont buy!!! Complete waste of money. I knew buying a crib online was a bad idea!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kelsearcy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and Great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This crib was the best purchase I made for the nursery! The process is awesome, I LOVE that it comes with a changing table, it was not too bad for me and my boyfriend to put together( took us about an hour and a half), and it feels really durable and strong! I love it and cant wait for my baby to get to use it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came fast and in good condition. A very nice crib for the price! My boyfriend and I didn't find the direction until we were almost done putting it together lol, but we easily found a copy online. The crib was relatively easy to assemble between the two of us. The package of screws and other little pieces was already open. They fell everywhere when we took it out of the box. All the pieces were there though.
customer_reviews.author: Winter W.

customer_reviews.title: Had to make new holes
customer_reviews.text: I love that it came with a changing table at a much cheaper price than other cribs. The only problem is that some of the premade holes weren’t aligned so when assembling it became crooked. I had to make new holes which just added in more time.
customer_reviews.author: Zhasity Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable combo & the cherry finish looks great. It took hours to put together but so does just about every crib LOL This will definitely be able to be used until she is at least 3 & wants a "big girl" bed
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Tee

customer_reviews.title: This is the first time I have ever had trouble but I am just so disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: I'm so aggravated with this order. Not only was it late, it came in the wrong color! I ordered black and it came in grey. My son's girlfriend is due any day and I don't have any time to exchange it out to fix this issue.. This is the first time I have ever had trouble but I am just so disappointed... Other than that, it was easy to set up and as a product looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice baby Bed
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of scared when I read some of the reviews.But I said what the heck the price was too good to pass on.Thank god everything was good no missing pieces or damaged parts.One thing I will say is that I wished that the changing table was not attached to the crib to give more options on placement.but other then that I am happy :)
customer_reviews.author: PRINCESS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty easy to assemble. Definitely need a second person to kinda just stand around and hold stuff up. Absolutely no problem to assist while pregnant. I absolutely love the way it looks in the nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. Took my hubby an hour to put it all together. Looks great and safe for him when he arrives. Packaging was damaged badly but luckily damage was minimal on the crib.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Nice crib
customer_reviews.text: The crib is working well for us. My husband and a friend assembled it pretty quickly. Just remember to not use crib bumpers or blankets in your crib! I see a lot of pictures with people using those things. You cannot use those things in cribs because they are DANGEROUS!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Experience sucked which is unusual
customer_reviews.text: Missing pieces and part of the instructions. Took UPS forever to pick it up after I had been giving the phone run around for days.
customer_reviews.author: jameshea

customer_reviews.title: Good, but be Honest!
customer_reviews.text: The crib is nice, The assembly was easy came with all the parts and the instructions. The box was a little damage in one corner but everything was fine. The only thing is that I received a 2 in 1 crib, when I supposed to get a 4 in 1. Probably it's not a big deal but just be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Great Combo
customer_reviews.text: This crib was easy to assemble once I found the instructions. I ended up staining it since it was so light but after that it was perfect, sturdy and roomy for baby. Only issue I had was that added crib bumpers was a little tricky since it didn't have for walls of bars. Looking forward to having this crib as baby girl grows
customer_reviews.author: Kelle-Shae

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to assemble. Looks great. The attached changing table is very useful. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: It’s one whole piece. The changing table is not separate
customer_reviews.text: Terrible discription on-line. You can only use the changing table with the bed. You can’t have the changing table separate. That is so stupid. I will be sending it back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very happy deal !
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing deal ! I got it for $134 and you don't usually get this stuff at that low price ! And it has a changing table attached which alone costs $60 or above everywhere .. it's beautiful and is of good quality and can be used for many long years to come .. :D
customer_reviews.author: Bala

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandbaby. It is a good value for money, however, it sucks that you can't take the changing table off of the crib. I'm not sure why they would design it like this, especially since it turns into a toddler bed..... don't they know 2 year olds love to climb.... and fly? ;)
customer_reviews.author: Manda79

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in the package I’ve received. This is my second time receiving this item I got it as a gift off of my baby registry and when I received the first one the holes were drilled on the wrong side of the changing table . So I asked for a replacement. It took them 3 weeks to come and get the original one and once I received the replacement it looked like this . Cracks in the wood , some holes are stripped . So many things wrong with this it’s completely unable to be put together .
customer_reviews.author: Megan Klaesen

customer_reviews.title: The crib is cracked
customer_reviews.text: I received the crib with a crack on it. I’m not sure if it was from manufacture or shipping and handling.
customer_reviews.author: Jansen Manuel Esteves

customer_reviews.title: Nice crib
customer_reviews.text: Very nice crib for the price. Love the changing table with it but wishes it could be detached for room rearrangement purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this crib
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib. It’s big, sturdy, and easy to put together. This was a Great buy. You will need a 28 x 52 inch mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Trenden Davis

customer_reviews.title: good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: good for the price, a couple screws were missing and the instructions were a little confusing, definitely a 2 person job! overall not bad it's been 2 years that I've had this and it is still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Charity94

customer_reviews.title: Damaged!
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to receive this crib. Unfortunately, I knew the product would be damaged just by looking at the box it arrived in. There was a whole in the corner of it! After opening I learned the crib was cracked in many different areas. There was no way we would be able to use it for our newborn baby. I will be returning this item. I do not want a refund on a gift card. I want my refund on the same card that I paid with.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Replacement parts may be hard to get.
customer_reviews.text: Package was delayed and when opened the boards that are to the shelves for changing station were cracked have contacted the manufacturer via email for replacements and two days later still no response will wait a few more days Other then that I was able to assemble crib easy and by myself everything lined up nice and tight feels good
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Love This Crib
customer_reviews.text: In love with this honestly, it's absolutely perfect! It's very sturdy and goes amazing with his bedding. Was fairly easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: 6 months with this product everything perfect still at first it was a bit hard to assemble due to instruction Manuel but if you pay close attention to what you are looking at it will be easy to assemble over all the quality is great no chips cracks creaks holds up very well will gladly buy another
customer_reviews.author: Bianna Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this crib and changing table set. It saves space while giving you all the room you need for both the crib side and changing table side. My only issue is that the mat slides everytime we use it. I had to put one of those nonslip mats down.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Theres no mattress included
customer_reviews.text: Its very easy to put together when you follow the instructions. It doesn't come with a mattress or the other parts to make it into a toddler bed /day bed. Those are sold separately. It was a little bigger than I expected but I have no problem with that. The more room the better. The changing table is detachable but then you'll be missing the footboard/ headboard and you'll have an uncompleted crib.
customer_reviews.author: Jose D.

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib!! I've found similar cribs in stores for SO much more money than this one. And the durability is great. Very good deal. Looks great. Putting it together was a challenge, but any crib would be challenging, so no complaints here!!
customer_reviews.author: Breana Dee

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib! The directions can be a bit confusing but once you get everything in order it’s so easy to put together, it did come with some damage but I blame that on UPS not handling the package with care I could tell the box was punctured before opening it and where it was punctured there was a whole in the wood but it’s part of the changing table so I just covered it up with diapers and wipes
customer_reviews.author: Cristin

customer_reviews.title: Really good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to built, my husband and I did in an hour. Really cute, better than I expected. Great value for money
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stangabiano

customer_reviews.title: Just what mama wanted!
customer_reviews.text: A nice fit in the nursery. Nice quality, beautiful finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kayro

customer_reviews.title: Great crib
customer_reviews.text: Great crib! The changing table is too small, but I use it for putting diapers and wipes on. My baby is 6 months old and too big for the changing table. Overal, satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mila Kha

customer_reviews.title: I regret buying this so bad
customer_reviews.text: I just realized why this was so cheap ... the changing path that come with it is too thin and when you try to replace you’ll never find a changing path the will fit it because a regular fit is 30” or 32” And the one the come with it is 27 ! Trust me you’ ll never find one also the wood looks super cheap and the finish is terrible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised how well made and how good this crib looked for the price! I love it and saved hundreds of dollars! It took me a minute to figure out how to insert the screws and nuts, but once I figured that out, I put it together by myself, without my husband, in about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: DivaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: This piece of crap was not able to be finished as the support platform did not fit correctly. Wasted an hr on this. Also baby can get foot stuck in changing station. Changing station doesn’t come with buckle.
customer_reviews.author: jessica Doering

customer_reviews.title: I bought it when my little one was around 4-6 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it when my little one was around 4-6 months old. He is 2.5 years old and we are still using it and hope to use it as a bed until he is 3.5-4 years old.
customer_reviews.author: N.

customer_reviews.title: Holes drilled incorrectly.....
customer_reviews.text: The main piece of this crib that has the shelves on it had it's holes drilled on the wrong side of the board making it impossible to assemble the crib and use the shelves. I read the instructions numerous times and even had my wife review them to make sure i was reading things correctly but the picture of what should be and where the holes were did not line up properly makint it impossible to completely assemble. I was forced to keep the crib because of the low cost and the necessity of my new born to sleep in his own room in his own crib.
customer_reviews.author: francisco

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Crib!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the white colored crib and this is such a beautiful crib and classy looking! Inexpensive but truly worth it! All the parts are complete and no scratches or dents! I cannot believe the price for this is way cheaper than other cribs! Comes with a diaper changer/table. Love love love the quality and the look!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great value !
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for 3 years and used it for two babes . Still in great condition
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: It's cute
customer_reviews.text: My husband got frustrated assembling this but it looks great. Good for small rooms. I just wish the padding on the changer was thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled it! Super easy to do so and being prgnt. Come with a 1 inch pad for changing table. The sturdiness is 4 out of 5 because the wood material is not a dense as other cribs. But it holds up pretty well. I love the combination of both crib and table.
customer_reviews.author: L Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived my husband could tell that something was wrong because the box was all torn dented. After looking through all of the pieces we saw some of them were damaged. The damage was not very significant and was in places that would not be seen. once the crib was all put together it looks really great it is sturdy and for the price I can't complain too much. not sure if damage was done by manufacturer or delivery process ...would recommend if you're on a budget and willing to take the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A BEAUTIFUL piece for my granddaughter to sleep in
customer_reviews.text: A BEAUTIFUL piece for my granddaughter to sleep in. It's very sturdy and fairly easy to assemble. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to check all parts
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this as several pieces were damaged in shipping and I couldn’t fully assemble the crib. Make sure to save the box and check all parts for damage. If the crib hadn’t been damaged, it would have been awesome. It was easy to assemble with 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my new grandson son said it was easy to assemble and it was not too expensive which is nice looks wonderful in babies room
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, sturdy crib. Does not come with any conversion materials. In addition the conversion rail for toddler bed sold on Amazon does NOT fit which is really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: It’s good enough
customer_reviews.text: This thing was awful putting together. Certain pieces did not fit right (I READ THE DIRECTIONS THOROUGHLY) and I felt like I was going to break it. The fact that you have to put the ENTIRE crib together with only an allen wrench was extremely painful. But, I do love the final product of this crib. It looks sturdy and durable. So I suggest hiring professionals to build it so you don’t get frustrated with the weird pieces like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Iamtoast

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby
customer_reviews.text: Got it discounted since it was on my registry .. despite all the negative things said about this, it was a great buy and works perfectly for easy changing in the middle of the night there is plenty of room for storage and even a touch light.
customer_reviews.author: Raelene Chinchilla

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice affordable crib. But it’s huge! Should’ve gotten a smaller crib.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Very practical and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and had it set up in about 45 minutes while being 8months pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Louise N

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I'm love the color and the setup was super easy. I am using this for my newborn and if I have any more children.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Beaverson

customer_reviews.title: Peeling paint, scratches etc..
customer_reviews.text: First off the box came super banged up with a hole in it where crib was exposed. Second, there were a lot of scratches all over it, paint peeling underneath the rim of the side with the changer but on the inside where it could fall in the crib! Not safe for baby at all, it was almost if it sat in somebody's basement for years!
customer_reviews.author: Shieldmaiden Eowyn

customer_reviews.title: bad experience
customer_reviews.text: worst experience ever i ordered it and it came in the mail so excited to put it together until i came across a cracked up headboard and the railing on the sides slacks were busted up in half.
customer_reviews.author: kirsten Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Despite the negative reviews I read before purchasing, I still decided to buy it. And boy I’m glad I did. This crib is sturdy, great quality and looks amazing. My husband assembled it without the instructions, but there are a lot of parts. Also be mindful to assemble it where it would be located because it’s very wide. Overall a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chasity

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Decent crib for the price.. Easy to assemble.. Some parts came damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Afg818

customer_reviews.title: Super excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This similar crib is MUCH more than on other sites AND at last minute price went down 30%!! Excellent storage, easy to assemble! Love!
customer_reviews.author: Heather McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Great Crib
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this crib for my new baby and this looks great. All the pieces came without any scratch and the materials looks great, easy and simple to assemble. I like the plastic covers in the rails to avoid toddlers to eat the paint or produce scratches. The price is awesome and the product has a great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Federico Arias C

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crib
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price for this crib, it looks great and wasn’t that hard to assemble. Normally this would have cost me a lot more elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Come With Toddler Bed Railing
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to assemble. Instructions eere extremely hard to understand. Also does not come with the railing to convert to toddler bed you have to buy it separately for $60. Is very sturdy though.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Bockelman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great value!!! They teething guards really help protect it. Son still uses it and he’s 10 months. The changing table can later be used as a shelf or bookcase for your child
customer_reviews.author: Roselor Saget

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This crib is totally worth the buy! It’s affordable and comes with the changing table and it’s not bad quality at all! Overall it’s very sturdy and wasn’t too hard for me and my boyfriend to put together. The only downside was that my changing pad I bought didn’t fit this changing table but I just removed the back guard thing and it fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Estella

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have a whole day and people to help!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this took 3 people to assemble and we are still not done. Instructions are not clear what so ever. We have put a few cribs together and this is the worst. Not the best quality of cribs either.
customer_reviews.author: Donald lee

customer_reviews.title: Cuties Doll Furniture
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great set for 5 or 6 yr old. I was expecting it to be bigger and thought my 10 yr old granddaughter would like it. She played with it for a while but it was too small for her.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Tight budget
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good looking, sturdy and dependable piece and even better because of the ridiculously low price.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Cotto

customer_reviews.title: Very nice crib, good value
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib with the attached changing table (pad included). My neighbor put it together for me, so I can’t speak about assembly. I think it looks great in the baby’s room. Also it was a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Leela

customer_reviews.title: 😍
customer_reviews.text: I love it, everything came just fine!!! Great crib for price.
customer_reviews.author: Tavia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib. It was easy to assemble, the changing table is just right and its a space saver. Its easy to adjust the height. And cleaning on it is simple as well
customer_reviews.author: Rilophy

customer_reviews.title: Not what it seems.
customer_reviews.text: What you see is NOT what you get. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Iris Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Just be aware that the assembly insructions are in an envelope on the bottom of the spring mattress support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Dream On Me, Anna 4-in-1 Full Size Crib and Changing Table Combo, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackThe Anna 4-In-1 Full Size Crib & Changing Table Combo is a stylish and functional investment that keeps pace with your child’s changing needs. Convert it from a crib to a toddler bed, and then a daybed (Toddler Guardrail/Stabilizer/Full Size Rail sold separately) as your child grows.The detachable changing table with two storage shelves adds to the utility. The changing table is equipped with a custom fit 1” changing pad. There are two open storage shelves beneath the table, allowing you to keep baby essentials handy.The Anna features a sleek and modern design with clean lines. You can choose from six elegant finishes- Black, Cherry, Espresso, Natural, White & Storm Grey and match it effortlessly with any nursery theme! All Dream On Me cribs are tested to ensure all applicable ASTM, JPMA & CPSC standards are met. This Anna comes with a stationary (non-drop side) rail system for added safety.Crib dimensions are 53.2Lx30Wx45.5H inches. All tools for assembly are included, conversion kit sold separately. Choose any Dream On Me non-toxic, Greenguard certified standard crib mattress for the perfect fit. Maximum weight limit is 50 lbs

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Dream on Me knows what a modern family needs and they supply it in this 4 in 1 Convertible Crib and Changing Table Combo. The crib grows with your child, becoming a toddler day bed when they have outgrown their crib. Featuring a non-toxic finish, dual hooded, locking wheels, and a stationary rail design (non-drop side) this crib is a sturdy, safe, durable and reliable choice. The matching changing table comes with a storage self underneath to store all your baby's essentials. Both the crib and toddler day bed takes a standard size Dream on Me mattress, sold separately. All tools for assembly included.
feature_bullets: CONVERTIBILITY OPTIONS: The Anna grows with your baby! Convert it from a crib to a toddler bed, and then a daybed (Toddler Guardrail/Stabilizer/Full Size Rail sold separately). The attached changing table with two storage shelves adds to its utility

USEFUL CHANGING TABLE: The Anna is fitted with a detachable changing table with a custom fit 1” changing pad. There are two open storage shelves beneath the table, with ample space to store baby essentials

TRENDY & STYLISH: The Anna’s design is sleek and modern,  and it fits beautifully into any nursery decor. You can choose from six elegant finishes- Black, Cherry, Espresso, Natural, White & Storm Grey
SAFETY MATTERS: All Dream On Me cribs are tested to ensure all applicable ASTM, JPMA & CPSC standards are met. This crib comes with a stationary (non-drop side) rail system for added safety

KEY SPECS: Crib dimensions are 53.2Lx30Wx45.5H inches. All tools for assembly are included, conversion kit sold separately. Choose any Dream On Me non-toxic, Greenguard certified standard crib mattress for the perfect fit. Maximum weight limit is 50 lbs.
